basic.description: The objective of the course is to introduce the student to the fundamentals necessary to understand and appreciate the issues involved in engineering in the body and to provide a framework for upper level studies in the area. Topics include: History of Biomedical Engineering, Anatomy and Physiology, Materials in Medicine, Transport Phenomena in the Body, Biomechanics, and Tissue Engineering.
basic.subject: CHEE
basic.title: Biomedical Engineering

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in a BSCE program
